Content:: The first Gotabaya Rajapaksa cabinet was a central government of Sri Lanka led by President Gotabaya Rajapaksa. It was formed in November 2019 after the presidential election and ended in August 2020 following the parliamentary election. Ministers appointed under article 43(1) of the constitution. ‚úù Died while in office. Ministers appointed under article 44(1) of the constitution.
